DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine response patient myelodysplastic syndrome ( include chronic myelomonocytic leukemia ) decitabine . OUTLINE : This open label , multicenter study . Patients stratified disease ( low risk myelodysplastic syndrome ( MDS ) vs. high risk MDS vs. chronic myelomonocytic leukemia ) . Patients receive decitabine 4 hour infusion every 8 hour day 1-3 . Treatment continue every 6-8 week 4-6 course . Patients follow 6 12 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 75 patient accrue study 1 year .
